import { Container } from '../../style'; const HowToBecomeTeacher = () => { return (

Who can teach and how to apply

Requirements

Here in Tagpros, we believe that formal teaching credentials are not necessary to be able to share your knowledge. However, we do have several requirements to ensure that what you share will bring value to the students.

  • Be at least 18 years old
  • Base your classes around one or more expertise or passion.
  • Meet our{' '} community standards , including prompt, professional communication with parents and the Tagpros team.{' '}
  • Observe our{' '} class content policy , including the policy that Tagpros classes are secular and objective.
  • Maintain a reliable and fast Internet connection (over 3Mbps upload and download).
  • Possess technical know-how to effectively run online classes.
  • Maintain a good command of written and spoken English.
  • Reside full-time in the Philippines or possess Filipino citizenship.

 

Becoming a teacher

Here are the steps to getting approved to teach. You can learn more by watching this{' '} video .

 

Learn

First, understand how it works. Consult our{' '} Teacher Guide . We also have a{' '} Facebook Group {' '} of Tagpros teachers.{' '}

 

Apply

Sign up {' '} on our website and follow the steps to submit an application. You will need to tell us about yourself and submit a short video of you teaching. Be sure to give us detailed information about your teaching experience, your expertise in the topics you would like to teach, and what you will bring to the platform!

 

Background Check

If your application meets our standards, we will ask you to submit documentation to prove it. Once your background check is completed, your request to teach will be approved. Check out our Teacher Background Check to learn more.

 

Get Started! Publish classes

Once you are approved to teach, we will invite you to schedule an optional one-on-one welcome call with an existing Tagpros teacher to help you get started.

You will now be able to:

  • Create class listings and schedule sections.
  • Submit your classes for review
  • Teach learners from around the world!
 ); }; export default HowToBecomeTeacher;
